articles.title: US revises travel advisory for India: Don't travel to Manipur, Jammu and Kashmir - India Today
articles.description: The US State Department039s updated travel advisory for India places several regions including Jammu and Kashmir the India-Pakistan border Manipur and parts of central and eastern India at Level 4 quotDo Not Travelquot due to crime terrorism and violence
articles.content:
The United States has asked its nationals not to travel to Manipur, Jammu and Kashmir, the India-Pakistan border, and parts of central and eastern parts of the country where Naxalites are active.

articles.title: Nifty 50, Sensex today: What to expect from Indian stock market in trade on July 25 | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: The trends on Gift Nifty also indicate a gap-down start for the Indian benchmark index. The Gift Nifty was trading around 24,290 level, a discount of nearly 230 points from the Nifty futures’ previous close.
articles.content:
Indian stock market benchmark indices, Sensex and Nifty 50, are likely to open lower on Thursday tracking losses in global peers.
